description: 1 x Lime (applicant's ref. T1) - Crown Thin by 20%, Remove epicormic growth from main stem, (Dead Wood), Reduce lowest over hanging branches (over maples) back to previous reduction points by approx 2-3m, Re-reduce lateral branches growing from main stem back to previous reduction points by approx 2m.  T48 of Tree Preservation Order;1 x Lime (applicant's ref. T3) - Remove epicormic re-growth from main stem, Retain and re-reduce the established lateral branches growing beneath the crown break on main stem back to previous reduction points by approx 2m, Crown Thin upper crown by 25% (Dead Wood). Standing in group G21 of Tree Preservation Order; 1 x Lime (applicant's ref. T4) - Remove epicormic re-growth to main crown break, Retain and re-reduce established previously reduced lateral branches growing beneath the crown break back to previous reduction points by approx 2m to maintain the lower section of the Crown, Crown Thin upper crown by 25%, (Dead Wood). Standing in group G21 of Tree Preservation Order; 1 x Lime (applicant's ref. T5) - Remove epicormic re-growth to approx 3m above main crown break retaining any branches that have been historically reduced, reducing them back to the most previous reduction points by approx 1-2m, Reduce the RHS side branch of no more than 6" diameter growing at approx 5m from ground level, below the crown break, back to previous the reduction points by approx 2m retaining branch, Crown thin upper crown by 20%. Standing in group G21 of Tree Preservation Order
